title: Campari Flamingo Recipe
full_text:
Campari Flamingo Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3/4
ounce
freshly squeezed juice
from
1 to 2
whole
limes
1 1/2
ounces
aged rum
, such as Appleton Estate
1/2
ounce
Campari
3
ounces
pink grapefruit soda
such as Fizzy Lizzy
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add lime juice, rum, and Campari. Shake well.
Strain into ice-filled rocks glass. Add grapefruit soda, stir gently and serve.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
Rum
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
